message: Documentation of one of today's attacks in the area of ​​the displaced persons' tents in Rafah in the south of the Gaza Strip - note the rocket rising into the sky. This indicates a precise hit by the aircraft on the target.
event_breakdown: - Attack on the displaced persons' tents in Rafah, Gaza Strip, with a rocket launched into the sky.

message:
Hamas in an official announcement:

In light of the recent contacts with the mediators, tomorrow a delegation of the movement will arrive in Cairo to complete the talks.

We emphasize that the leadership of the movement reacted in a positive spirit to the proposal it received while discussing it. We are going to Cairo in the same positive atmosphere to reach an agreement.

We are determined to reach an agreement that will realize the demands of our people for a total cessation of aggression, the withdrawal of forces, the return of the displaced, aid to our people, the beginning of the reconstruction of the Gaza Strip and a serious exchange deal.
event_breakdown: - Hamas delegation to arrive in Cairo for talks

message:
Gazans complain: as part of the food packages distributed at UNRA schools, we received a food product that contains pork 🐷...

حسب الله ونعم الوكيل
location: The main location of the event is Gaza.
event_breakdown: 1. Gazans complain: Food packages distributed at UNRA schools contain pork.

message: Reuters from a senior Hamas official: a Hamas delegation will arrive in Cairo tomorrow.
event_breakdown: - Hamas delegation to arrive in Cairo

message:
The Houthis clarify the words of the Houthi military spokesman and point out that starting today every ship that docks in an Israeli port will be "marked" and as soon as it passes through an area within the reach of the Houthis it will be attacked even if it is not on its way to an Israeli port at the time.

If Israel enters Rafah, the next step for the Houthis will be to attack all ships belonging to companies that even one of their ships docks in Israeli ports.
event_breakdown:
1. The Houthis issue a threat to attack any ship that docks in an Israeli port.
2. Potential escalation as the Houthis plan to target ships of companies with vessels docking at Israeli ports if Israel enters Rafah.

message:
One of the signs of abundance in the northern Gaza Strip: Gazan donkeys receive fresh pita bread

A Gazan from the north of the Gaza Strip to the donkey: once (when there was a shortage of bread) we ate from your food, now take and eat bread from today. You are better than many people...
event_breakdown:
- Gazan donkeys in the northern Gaza Strip receive fresh pita bread as a sign of abundance
- A Gazan from the north of the Gaza Strip offers pita bread to the donkeys, expressing gratitude for their resilience and sharing abundance

message:
American Central Command:

Due to weather conditions, construction work on the floating pier off the coast of Gaza was stopped and it was moved to Ashdod port, where its construction will be completed.

After the completion of its construction, it will be floated along the shores of Gaza to the place where it was planned to be placed.
event_breakdown:
- Construction work on the floating pier off the coast of Gaza was stopped due to weather conditions
- The floating pier was moved to Ashdod port for completion of construction
- Upon completion, the floating pier will be floated along the shores of Gaza to its intended location

message:
Reuters from an Egyptian source:

The head of the CIA, William Burns, arrived in Cairo to promote the ceasefire in Gaza.

##
The Americans are using all their weight and are firing their heaviest guns to reach a ceasefire.
event_breakdown:
1. Head of CIA, William Burns, arrives in Cairo to promote ceasefire in Gaza.
2. American efforts for ceasefire in Gaza intensify.

message:
The American Wall Street Journal:

Israel gave Hamas an extension of one week that will end this coming weekend to respond to the proposal it submitted.

Yahya Sinwar has not yet responded to the Israeli proposal.

According to the newspaper, Hamas is asking for American guarantees for the non-renewal of fighting after the upcoming deal, since in its view the clause in the proposal surrounding the matter is "too vague" and allows Israel to return to fighting.
event_breakdown:
- Israel gives Hamas one-week extension to respond to proposal
- Yahya Sinwar has not responded yet to Israeli proposal
- Hamas asks for American guarantees for non-renewal of fighting after deal

message:
Berlin: A large fire at the Diehl company's weapons manufacturing plant. 
The Diehl company manufactures defensive weapon systems and guided missiles.
event_breakdown: - Berlin: A large fire at the Diehl company's weapons manufacturing plant.

message: Paris: French security forces break into Sciences Po the Institute of Political Science to break up an anti-Israel demonstration by the students there.
event_breakdown: - French security forces break into Sciences Po (Institute of Political Science) to disperse an anti-Israel demonstration by students. (Location: Paris)

message:
About 100,000 Palestinians have left the Gaza Strip since the beginning of the war

The Palestinian ambassador in Egypt: since the beginning of the war and until April, 85 thousand Palestinians left the Gaza Strip for Egypt through the Rafah crossing.

Taking the month of April into account, it can be estimated that about one hundred thousand Palestinians left the Strip since the beginning of the war.
event_breakdown:
- About 100,000 Palestinians have left the Gaza Strip since the beginning of the war
- 85 thousand Palestinians left the Gaza Strip for Egypt through the Rafah crossing from the beginning of the war until April
- Taking the month of April into account, an estimated 100,000 Palestinians have left the Strip since the start of the conflict

message:
A must watch:

Students from the "Free Palestine Army" charge Portland police officer with shields made from trash cans.

##
Not the sharpest tools in the shed...
event_breakdown: - Students from the "Free Palestine Army" charge Portland police officer with shields made from trash cans.

message:
Fox News: The Iranian flag was raised by the students at the University of Irvine in California.

Iran is offering scholarships to students who will be expelled from US universities following the protests.
event_breakdown:
1. Iranian flag raised by students at University of Irvine in California
2. Iran offers scholarships to students facing expulsion from US universities after protests

message:
Reuters from the Turkish Minister of Commerce:

The suspension of trade with Israel will continue until a permanent cease-fire in Gaza and until Israel allows all aid into the strip. 

##
Turkey has de-facto joined the Shiite axis - like the Houthis... they are harming the Israeli economy until a ceasefire is reached. The Sultan became a Houthi pirate.

Israel should remember this when Turkey wants to resume trade between the countries.
event_breakdown:
1. Suspension of trade with Israel to continue until permanent ceasefire in Gaza and unrestricted aid access.
2. Turkey aligns with Shiite axis, affecting Israeli economy until ceasefire reached.

message:
The Shia militias in Iraq claim:
Yesterday afternoon (May 2nd) we launched two cruise missiles from Iraq at a target in Tel Aviv and at a target in Be'er Sheva.

The militias in Iraq also claim that they attacked an Israeli target in the Dead Sea early this morning "with appropriate weapons".

###
Sources of the Lebanese al-Mayadeen claim that the Iraqi cruise missiles were launched at the Glilot Base in Tel Aviv and the Avraham Base in Be'er Sheva.
event_breakdown:
- Yesterday afternoon (May 2nd): Shia militias in Iraq launched two cruise missiles from Iraq targeting Tel Aviv and Be'er Sheva
- Early this morning: The militias in Iraq attacked an Israeli target in the Dead Sea with appropriate weapons

message:
The coup in Niger: Russian soldiers reportedly enter a military base where the American troops are stationed

According to Reuters, Russian soldiers have entered a military air base housing American forces in the capital of Niger.

As you might remember, last year there was a coup in Niger and the military junta that seized power demanded that the US terminate the agreement with it and... remove all American forces from Niger.

The American forces have not yet evacuated and now they have new "guests" at their base.

American officials state that the Russian and American soldiers remain in separate areas at the base. The American Secretary of Defense spoke out on the matter and said that there is no fear that the Russians will get their hands on American equipment.

##
The Taliban send their regards..
event_breakdown: Taliban fighters launch an attack on a military base in Afghanistan, resulting in casualties.

message:
Last night's attack in Damascus, attributed to Israel

Syrian sources identified with the Shiite axis report that the target of the Israeli attack in Damascus was the "State Security School" (of the Syrian Army - AA), near the village of Najaha, and as a result, a three-story building was severely damaged there.
According to these sources, the target of the attack belonged to the Syrian army and not to Iranian elements in Syria.

The Syrian Ministry of Defense officially announced that Israel carried out an airstrike last night at 10:05 PM which resulted in the injury of 8 Syrian soldiers and damage to property.
event_breakdown:
- Last night's attack in Damascus, attributed to Israel
- Israeli attack targeted the "State Security School" near the village of Najaha, severely damaging a three-story building
- Target of the attack belonged to the Syrian army and not to Iranian elements in Syria
- Syrian Ministry of Defense officially announced Israel's airstrike at 10:05 PM, resulting in the injury of 8 Syrian soldiers and property damage

message:
After the report of the Bloomberg agency's reporter in Turkey 👆, the Turkish Ministry of Commerce officially announces:

From today, the import of goods from Israel and the export of goods to it will be suspended until all aid can be brought into the Gaza Strip
event_breakdown: - Turkish Ministry of Commerce announces suspension of import and export of goods to and from Israel

message: Palestinian sources report the death of officer Muhammad Adas, one of the companions of Palestinian Authority Chairman Abu Mazen from the Presidential Guard, as a result of an IDF shot that hit him in the head during the entry of IDF forces into the village of Anbata in the Tulkarm district in the last hour.
event_breakdown: - Death of officer Muhammad Adas in the village of Anbata, Tulkarm district as a result of an IDF shot

message:
Sources associated with the Syrian opposition report on limited explosions heard in the last half hour in Damascus, the capital of Syria.

According to these sources, the Syrian air defense systems were not activated.

The sources add that an Israeli airstrike was carried out against a military post near the fifth bridge on the road leading to the Damascus border.
event_breakdown:
- Limited explosions heard in Damascus, Syria
- Syrian air defense systems not activated
- Israeli airstrike carried out against a military post near the fifth bridge on the road leading to the Damascus border

message:
Following today's report on the death of Dr. Adnan Albarsh 👆 and another Gazan, in prison in Israel, Hamas, in an official announcement on its behalf, is trying to create symmetry with the Israeli abductees in Gaza and states that "the death of two of our people abducted in the prison of the fascist occupation, under barbaric torture is proof of the heinous war crimes committed by the occupation.. "
Hamas calls on the international community to act immediately and condemn "this Nazi behavior and force Israel to reveal what happened to the thousands of Palestinians kidnapped by Israel and to return them to their families..."
event_breakdown:
- Death of Dr. Adnan Albarsh and another Gazan in prison in Israel
- Hamas accuses Israel of committing heinous war crimes against prisoners
- Hamas calls on the international community to condemn Israel's behavior and demand the return of Palestinian prisoners

message: Palestinian channels: Settlers threw stones at Palestinian vehicles on Route 60
event_breakdown: - Settlers throw stones at Palestinian vehicles on Route 60.

message:
A new organization calling itself the "Ashtar Brigades" - the Islamic resistance in Bahrain, claims to have launched a drone at the "Traknet" company, which deals with vessel traffic, in Eilat.

This is the first time that an organization related to the axis of resistance located in Bahrain accepts responsibility for military action against Israel.

##
Bahrain is signed on the Abraham Accords security agreement with Israel.
event_breakdown: - The Ashtar Brigades, an Islamic resistance organization in Bahrain, claims responsibility for launching a drone at the Traknet company in Eilat, Israel

message:
IDF spokesperson:

Earlier today, IDF forces cleared the remains of another surface-to-surface missile that was intercepted in the Nahal Yalim area, near Arad, as part of the Iranian attack that took place last month.

Hazardous materials were cleared out and the evacuation was carried out using a crane (Rio 6x6) by IDF forces, led by the South District of the Home Front Command and together with fire and rescue forces.

The public is requested to act in accordance with the instructions of the Home Front Command when encountering a suspicious object. It is important to emphasize that falls and fragments of interceptions and missles may be dangerous.
Don't touch them, stay away and report finding them to the police hotline 100.
event_breakdown:
- IDF forces cleared the remains of a surface-to-surface missile in Nahal Yalim area near Arad
- Hazardous materials were cleared out and evacuation conducted using a crane (Rio 6x6) by IDF forces
- Public advised to follow Home Front Command instructions when encountering suspicious objects

message:
The Palestinian Prisoner's Club:
Dr. Adnan Albarash, head of the Orthopedics Department at Shifa Hospital in Gaza City, who was arrested by IDF forces who raided the hospital compound, died in an Israeli prison.
event_breakdown: - Dr. Adnan Albarash, head of Orthopedics at Shifa Hospital in Gaza City, dies in Israeli prison after being arrested by IDF forces during a raid on the hospital compound.

message: American police officers fire rubber bullets and tear gas at the pro-Hamas students at UCLA.
event_breakdown: -American police officers fire rubber bullets and tear gas at pro-Hamas students at UCLA

message: Ismail Haniyeh, Chairman of the Political Bureau of Hamas in a conversation with the Egyptian Minister of Intelligence: very soon a delegation of the movement will arrive in Cairo to complete the talks in order to reach an agreement that will meet the demands of the Palestinian people and stop the aggression.
event_breakdown:
- Ismail Haniyeh, Chairman of the Political Bureau of Hamas, met with the Egyptian Minister of Intelligence in Cairo
- Discussion on a forthcoming delegation from Hamas to Cairo for talks to reach an agreement satisfying Palestinian demands and halting aggression
